By Kasey Cunningham and Sarah Krueger, WRAL reporters
Greensboro, N.C. — A FEMA-operated COVID-19 mass vaccination site opens in Greensboro on Wednesday morning. It's one of only 18 in the country.… [+2259 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Collier
articles.title: 'Really messy': Why the hack of Microsoft's email system is getting worse - NBC News
articles.description: A week after Microsoft announced that its widely used email server program had been hacked, experts are not encouraged by what they have found.
articles.content:
A week after Microsoft announced that its widely used email server program had been hacked, experts are not encouraged by what they have found.
In short, it's gotten really messy, said Katie Nickels… [+3600 chars]
